trans-unit.source: The IDataServiceConfiguration is used by [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to set up the behavior of the service, including rights on entity sets and service operations, limits on the allowed requests, registering types not discoverable by default, and the default verbosity on error handling.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 IDataServiceConfiguration[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]为了设置服务，包括对实体集和服务操作的权限的行为会限制对所允许的请求，注册不易发现默认情况下，和错误处理的默认详细级别的类型。

trans-unit.source: This type is used by <xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601> classes to configure the service by implementing a static method named InitializeService, returning void, and taking a single argument of type IDataServiceConfiguration.
trans-unit.target: 使用此类型<xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601>类用于通过实现一个静态方法，来配置服务名为 InitializeService，返回 void，并采用单个参数的类型 IDataServiceConfiguration。</xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601>

trans-unit.source: The configuration object may only be used during the call to service initialization.
trans-unit.target: 配置对象只能在调用服务初始化过程。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of requests that can be handled in a batch.
trans-unit.target: 在批处理中获取的最大可以处理的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Integer value that indicates the maximum number of requests that can be handled in a batch.
trans-unit.target: 整数值，该值指示最大可以在批处理中处理的请求数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of change sets that can be handled in a batch.
trans-unit.target: 获取一批中可以处理的最大更改集数。

trans-unit.source: Integer value that indicates the maximum number of change sets that can be handled in a batch.
trans-unit.target: 指示可以在批处理中处理的最大更改集数的整数值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of segments that can be expanded by the $expand query option for all requests to the data service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大的段的可展开 $expand 查询选项对数据服务的所有请求。

trans-unit.source: If the limit is exceeded, a 400 Bad Request status code is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果超出限制，则返回 400 错误请求状态代码。

trans-unit.source: The value specified must be between 0 and `int.MaxValue`; otherwise, an `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值必须介于 0 和`int.MaxValue`; 否则为`ArgumentOutOfRangeException`引发。

trans-unit.source: The following query string sample has two segments:
trans-unit.target: 下面的查询字符串示例有两个段︰

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of segments to expand.
trans-unit.target: 要展开段中最大的数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a maximum number of segments supported in a single `$expand` path for all requests to the data service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的支持在单个的段上限数`$expand`所有对数据服务请求的路径。

trans-unit.source: If the limit is exceeded, a 400 Bad Request status code is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果超出限制，则返回 400 错误请求状态代码。

trans-unit.source: The value specified must be between 0 and `int.MaxValue`; otherwise, an `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值必须介于 0 和`int.MaxValue`; 否则为`ArgumentOutOfRangeException`引发。

trans-unit.source: The following query string sample has two segments in the first `$expand` path and one in the second `$expand` path:
trans-unit.target: 下面的查询字符串示例在第一个具有两段`$expand`路径和一个在第二个`$expand`路径︰

trans-unit.source: Integer representing the maximum number of supported segments in `$expand` path.
trans-unit.target: 表示的最大数目的整数支持段中的`$expand`路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of objects that can be inserted in a single request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可插入单个请求中的对象的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: The integer value that contains the maximum number of objects that can be inserted in a single request.
trans-unit.target: 包含可以插入单个请求中的对象的最大数目的整数值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of results per collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取最大每个集合的结果数。

trans-unit.source: The integer value that indicates the maximum number of results per collection.
trans-unit.target: 整数值，该值指示最大每个集合的结果数。

trans-unit.source: Registers a resource type for use by the data service.
trans-unit.target: 注册数据服务使用的资源类型。

trans-unit.source: The resource type to register.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的资源类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the access rules for the specified entity set.
trans-unit.target: 将集设置为指定的实体的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: The default configuration is to deny access to resources.
trans-unit.target: 默认配置是拒绝对资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: When a service is initialized the access rights must be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化服务时必须启用访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity set for configured access.
trans-unit.target: 为配置的访问设置实体的名称。

trans-unit.source: The rights allowed for the entity set.
trans-unit.target: 允许的实体集的权限。

trans-unit.source: Sets the access rules for the specified service operation.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的服务操作的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: The default configuration is to deny access to resources.
trans-unit.target: 默认配置是拒绝对资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: When a service is initialized, the access rights must be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 初始化服务时，必须启用访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The name of the service operation on which to set access rights.
trans-unit.target: 在其上设置访问权限的服务操作的名称。

trans-unit.source: The rights allowed according to <xref href="System.Data.Services.ServiceOperationRights"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 根据允许的权限<xref href="System.Data.Services.ServiceOperationRights"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether verbose errors are used by default for all responses from the data service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否来自数据服务的所有响使用详细的错误默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: The response from a specified request can be overridden by the data service developer by overriding the `HandleException` method.
trans-unit.target: 指定请求的响应时可以重写由数据服务开发人员通过重写`HandleException`方法。

trans-unit.source: Verbose errors should only be enabled during development, not in production environments, for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: 仅应在开发期间，不在生产环境中，出于安全原因启用详细错误。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether verbose errors are returned.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否返回详细错误。
